channel.title: Day by Data
channel.description: Recent content on Day by Data

item.title: About me
item.description: # Observe science by data # with some models or some indicators My name is June Young Lee. I keep body and soul together somewhere I’m rambling in the periphery of science I’m operating the observation device called SciSci I’d like to scribble some ideas on this space. Ask a question or make a suggestion : Here

item.title: About
item.description: This is a “hello world” example website for the blogdown package. The theme was forked from @jrutheiser/hugo-lithium-theme and modified by Yihui Xie.

item.title: About me
item.description: # observe science by data # with some models or some indicators My name is June Young Lee. I keep body and soul together at somewhere I’m rambling in the periphery of science I’m operating the observation device called SciSci I’d like to scribble some ideas on this space, so don’t take it too seriously. Ask a question or make a suggestion : Here
